title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Formula 1 Extends Fandom with AI, Data, and AWS Media Services (IND3326)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 一级方程式利用AI、数据和AWS媒体服务拓展粉丝体验 (IND3326)
abstract: In this session, you will learn how Formula 1 is revving up fan experiences with cloud and generative AI technology. Discover how Formula 1 is revolutionizing motorsport entertainment through cutting-edge cloud and AI technology. Learn how real-time data analytics and generative AI are transforming race broadcasts and fan engagement, and how AWS Media Services is powering 1 TV Premium, F1's new streaming service that launched in 2025. We'll explore F1's innovative solutions for enhancing race operations and fan experiences, demonstrating how technology is reshaping the future of live sports entertainment.
abstract_cn: 在本次会议中，您将了解一级方程式如何利用云和生成式AI技术提升车迷体验。探索一级方程式如何通过尖端的云和AI技术彻底改变赛车运动娱乐。了解实时数据分析和生成式AI如何改变赛事转播和车迷互动，以及AWS Media Services如何为F1 TV Premium（一级方程式于2025年推出的全新流媒体服务）提供支持。我们将探讨F1在增强赛事运营和车迷体验方面的创新解决方案，展示技术如何重塑现场体育娱乐的未来。
